# ClawBroker AI

> ClawBroker AI is a commercial real estate AI platform built on the
> OpenClaw agent framework. It gives CRE brokers and brokerage firm
> owners a full AI team — accessible via Telegram — that handles
> property search, demographic analysis, document extraction, market
> monitoring, client memory, and chart generation.

## Skills (What the Agent Can Do)
- [Search](https://clawbroker.ai/#skills): Find available properties for sale or lease using AI-powered web search (Quick Search via Google/Gemini, Deep Search via Parallel AI)
- [Memory](https://clawbroker.ai/#skills): Remembers every client's criteria, preferences, and deal history across conversations
- [Extract](https://clawbroker.ai/#skills): Forward an email with property docs (PDF, XLSX, CSV, images) — agent extracts addresses, pricing, cap rates and creates a project automatically
- [Demographics](https://clawbroker.ai/#skills): Pull population, income, housing, employment data for any property via ESRI GeoEnrichment (58 data types, radius or drive-time analysis)
- [Monitor](https://clawbroker.ai/#skills): Set market alerts — get new listings and changes delivered daily, weekly, or biweekly on autopilot
- [Charts](https://clawbroker.ai/#skills): Turn any data into professional bar, line, or doughnut charts instantly

## Deliverables
- Interactive Property Survey Grid with maps, labels, and client feedback
- AI-generated demographic reports with confidence scores and citations
- Automated BOVs, offering memorandums, and listing descriptions

## Key Pages
- [Home](https://clawbroker.ai)
- [Sign Up (Free $50 Credit)](https://clawbroker.ai/sign-up)
- [Book a Demo](https://cal.com/cobroker/website)

## Company
- Founded: 2024
- Industry: Commercial Real Estate Technology (CRE PropTech)
- Target Users: Commercial real estate brokers and brokerage firm owners
- Built on: OpenClaw agent framework
- Channel: Telegram (24/7 access from phone)
